Full Description: Stratus Digital Systems (“Stratus”) is an early stage cloud privacy and cybersecurity company that has transformed the way sensitive and critical data are communicated. These elegant, simple changes reintroduce financial discipline, transparency, and provide computing resources that are secure, private, responsive and on-demand. Access is truly a Zero Trust architecture, reduced to only the parties authorized and authenticated to the instance. In other words, there is no server administrator, super-user access or any other logical access control vulnerabilities, which are would be necessary evils--and built-in risks--required to manage and optimize static servers (e.g., repeated patches to stale software).
